SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Annual growth rate of real GDP per employed person
